    <static> quat_project(quat, quat_ident_dir, plane, plane_ident_dir, dest)

    Perform quaternion projection.
    Parameters:
    Name Type Argument Description
    quat Quaternion to project.
    quat_ident_dir Direction corresponding to identity quat.
    plane Plane direction (normal).
    plane_ident_dir Direction corresponding to identity quat in plane.
    dest <optional>
    		 Destination quaternion.
